data.comment: The match has started.
The match has started.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Columbus.
Maxime Chanot (New York City) has been sent off!
Lucas Zelarrayan (Columbus) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Free kick Columbus.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Columbus.
Ramy Touchan signals a New York City throw-in in Columbus's half.
Free kick for New York City in the half of Columbus.
Vito Wormgoor (Columbus) gets a yellow card.
The match at Mapfre Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alexander Callens, who is down injured.
Alexander Callens returns to the field for New York City after picking up a slight injury.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City make their first substitution with Sebastien Ibeagha replacing Jesus Medina.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for New York City at Mapfre Stadium.
Columbus's Pedro Santos has been booked in Columbus.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Ramy Touchan awards the home team a throw-in.
Pedro Santos of Columbus gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ramy Touchan awards New York City a goal kick.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Pedro Santos for Columbus gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
New York City have a goal kick.
Throw-in New York City.
New York City's Alexandru Mitrita gets in a shot on goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Columbus drive upfield and Youness Mokhtar gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York City defender.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Heber (New York City) has received a yellow card from Ramy Touchan.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Columbus close to the penalty box.
Pedro Santos (Columbus) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Gyasi Zardes for Columbus drives towards goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Columbus.
In Columbus a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Columbus New York City drive forward through Ronald Matarrita. His shot is on target but it's saved.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Free kick Columbus.
Throw-in for New York City at Mapfre Stadium.
Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Columbus.
James Sands (New York City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
The first-half is over at Mapfre Stadium.
The second half has started at Mapfre Stadium.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
New York City to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Artur gets his shot on target but fails to score for Columbus.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Ramy Touchan awards New York City a goal kick.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Throw-in Columbus.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for New York City in the half of Columbus.
Artur is booked for the home team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Columbus.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Columbus take a 1-0 lead thanks to Lucas Zelarrayan.
The home team replace Youness Mokhtar with Luis Diaz.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Ramy Touchan.
Ball safe as Columbus is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ramy Touchan signals a New York City throw-in in Columbus's half.
In Columbus Columbus drive forward through Luis Diaz. His shot is on target but it's saved.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Sebastien Ibeagha for New York City who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Keaton Parks (New York City) has replaced the possibly injured Sebastien Ibeagha at Mapfre Stadium.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Columbus close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Columbus in the half of New York City.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
New York City to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
New York City needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
New York City have a goal kick.
Throw-in Columbus.
Ramy Touchan signals a throw-in for New York City, close to Columbus's area.
Valentin Castellanos is replacing Heber for the away team.
Throw-in for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Free kick for Columbus in their own half.
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Columbus's Luis Diaz misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for New York City at Mapfre Stadium.
New York City are in shooting range from this free kick.
[62] ([63]) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Ramy Touchan signals a free kick to New York City just outside Columbus's area.
Harrison Afful for Columbus has been booked by Ramy Touchan and receives a first yellow card.
Keaton Parks's header is off-target for New York City.
Goal kick for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Throw-in for Columbus in their own half.
Ramy Touchan awards the away team a throw-in.
Fanendo Adi is on a sub for Gyasi Zardes for Columbus.
In Columbus, Pedro Santos (Columbus) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Columbus.
Columbus's Luis Diaz gets in a shot on goal at Mapfre Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ramy Touchan signals a New York City throw-in in Columbus's half.
New York City to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to New York City.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Columbus.
New York City's Keaton Parks breaks free at Mapfre Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Columbus have a goal kick.
Chris Cadden is replacing Lucas Zelarrayan for Columbus at Mapfre Stadium.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Columbus's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Vito Wormgoor.
